title: Heller's Vegetarisches
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out, German
description: Self-service, large space, non-smoking indoors, also garden seating. Good labeling for vegan and gluten-free items, though sometimes it's best to confirm with staff. Uses some organic ingredients. Has usually at least one vegan cake, plus coffee and cappuccino available soy or rice milk.
